title: Morningstar's Sarah Newcomb on Helping Clients Break Bad Money Habits
description: One key is listening to the stories clients tell about money and determining whether they see themselves as personally in control of their finances, says Sarah Newcomb, Morningstar's behavioral economist.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: One key is listening to the stories clients tell about money and determining whether they see themselves as personally in control of their finances, says Sarah Newcomb, Morningstar's behavioral economist.
